name: resource.design
displayName: NFDI4Health Metadata Schema V3.3 – Design Block

name: resource.design.primaryDesign
dataverseAlias: Is it an interventional or non-interventional [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Non-interventional design refers to a [RESOURCE] that does not aim to alter its outcomes of interest. Interventional design refers to a [RESOURCE] that aims to alter its outcomes of interest. Select between non-interventional and interventional design for the given [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.studyType
dataverseAlias: Specification of the type of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information about the type of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.studyType.interventional
displayName: 'The strategy for assigning interventions to participants. Select all that apply. If ''Other'' is selected, please specify the type of the [RESOURCE] in the field ''Additional information about the [RESOURCE]''.'

name: resource.design.studyType.nonInterventional
displayName: 'The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up. Select all that apply. If ''Other'' is selected, please specify the type of the [RESOURCE] in the field ''Additional information about the [RESOURCE]''.'

name: resource.design.conditions
dataverseAlias: Primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information about primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.conditions.label
dataverseAlias: Primary health condition or disease name
displayName: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the [RESOURCE]. Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

name: resource.design.conditions.classification
displayName: Terminology/classification used for the health condition or disease. If used, name of the terminology/classification.

name: resource.design.conditions.code
dataverseAlias: Code of the health condition or disease
displayName: Code of the health condition or disease in the terminology/classification used. If known, you can provide the code from the terminology/classification used.

name: resource.design.focus
displayName: Group of items providing information about the focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

name: resource.design.focus.label
displayName: Focus area of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.). Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

name: resource.design.focus.classification
displayName: Terminology/classification used for the focus. If used, name of the terminology/classification.

name: resource.design.focus.code
displayName: Code of the focus area in the terminology/classification used. If known, you can provide the code from the terminology/classification used.

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases
displayName: Group of items providing information about groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
displayName: 'General groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.conditions
dataverseAlias: On which diseases or conditions were the data collected?
displayName: 'Diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply. Values are based on lower level ICD-10. For more information visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'

name: resource.design.mortalityData
displayName: Indication whether mortality data were collected in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation
displayName: Group of items providing administrative information about the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Status of the ethics committee approval
displayName: Status of the [RESOURCE] approval from the (leading) ethics committee.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
displayName: Overall status of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.statusWhenIntervention
displayName: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants receive an intervention or have completed it but are still being followed up according to the primary objective of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.stageStopped
displayName: Specification of the stage at which the [RESOURCE] was prematurely stopped. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.reasonStopped
displayName: Specification of the reason(s) why the [RESOURCE] was prematurely stopped. You can provide reasons such as closed due to toxicity, closed due to lack of [RESOURCE] progress, temporarily-closed per [RESOURCE] design, etc.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.statusEnrollingByInvitation
displayName: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants have been selected from a predetermined population.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.recruitmentStatusRegister
dataverseAlias: Overall recruitment status from the register of clinical trials
displayName: Overall recruitment status of the [RESOURCE] as indicated in the corresponding register of clinical trials.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.startDate
displayName: Start date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]. In case of a planned [RESOURCE], enter the intended start date. In case of an ongoing [RESOURCE], enter the actual start date.

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.endDate
displayName: In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other participants, it is the date when the last participant is examined or receives an intervention, or the date of the last participant’s last visit. In case of a planned or ongoing [RESOURCE], enter the intended end date. In case of a completed [RESOURCE], enter the actual end date.

name: resource.design.centers
displayName: Specification whether the [RESOURCE] is conducted at only one or at more than one [RESOURCE] center.

name: resource.design.centersNumber
displayName: Number of centers involved in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.dataProviders
dataverseAlias: One or more data providers involved?
displayName: Specification whether the [RESOURCE] involves only one or more than one data provider.

name: resource.design.dataProvidersNumber
displayName: Number of data providers involved in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.subject
displayName: The primary subject addressed by the [RESOURCE], i.e. a person, an animal or other subject types. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.sampling
displayName: Group of items providing information about the applied sampling method.

name: resource.design.sampling.method
displayName: Type of the sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.sampling.probabilityMethod
displayName: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.sampling.nonProbabilityMethod
displayName: Specific type of the non-probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.dataSource
displayName: Group of items providing information about data sources from which the data of the [RESOURCE] are generated or extracted.

name: resource.design.dataSource.general
displayName: Different types of data sources from which the data of the [RESOURCE] are generated or extracted. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSource.biosamples
displayName: Specification of biosamples collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSource.imaging
displayName: Specification of imaging data collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSource.omics
displayName: Specification of omics technology applied in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSource.description
displayName: 'If needed, additional descriptive information about the data sources of the [RESOURCE], e.g. indication of the data source(s) not listed in the field ''Type(s) of data sources'' or a more detailed description of the selected data sources. You can indicate here other data source(s) not listed in the field ''Type(s) of data sources'' or provide a more detailed description of the selected data sources.'

name: resource.design.primaryPurpose
displayName: 'Specification of the main purpose of the [RESOURCE]. Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the [RESOURCE] was conducted. For non-interventional studies, this field may be ''Not applicable'' as multiple purposes may be defined as primary ones.'

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria
displayName: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for [RESOURCE] participants.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMin
displayName: Group of items providing information about the minimum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMin.number
displayName: Numerical value of the minimum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMin.timeUnit
displayName: Unit of measurement used to describe the minimum eligible age.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMax
displayName: Group of items providing information about the maximum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMax.number
displayName: Numerical value of the maximum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.ageMax.timeUnit
displayName: Unit of measurement used to describe the maximum eligible age.

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.genders
displayName: 'Gender of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply. If no gender was explicitly excluded in the [RESOURCE], ''Male'', ''Female'', and ''Diverse'' should be selected.'

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.inclusionCriteria
displayName: 'Inclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE]. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion, starting with ''-'' and finishing with '';''.'
blockURI: - First inclusion criterion; - Second inclusion criterion;

name: resource.design.eligibilityCriteria.exclusionCriteria
displayName: 'Exclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE]. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion, starting with ''-'' and finishing with '';''.'
blockURI: - First inclusion criterion; - Second inclusion criterion;

name: resource.design.population
displayName: Group of items providing information about the population of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.population.coverage
displayName: Specification of the recruitment area of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.population.countries
displayName: Country or countries where the [RESOURCE] takes place. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.population.region
displayName: If applicable, region(s) and/or city(ies) within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

name: resource.design.population.description
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about the population of the [RESOURCE]. Any information important for the given [RESOURCE] population can be specified here.

name: resource.design.population.targetSampleSize
displayName: Intended number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. intended number of [RESOURCE] participants at all sites of the [RESOURCE]).

name: resource.design.population.obtainedSampleSize
displayName: Obtained number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. obtained number of [RESOURCE] participants at all sites of the [RESOURCE]).

name: resource.design.hypotheses
displayName: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.arms
displayName: Group of items providing information about arms of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.arms.label
displayName: Short name used to identify the arm.

name: resource.design.arms.type
displayName: Role of the given arm in the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.arms.description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given arm.

name: resource.design.groups
displayName: Group of items providing information about groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.groups.label
displayName: Short name used to identify the group.

name: resource.design.groups.description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given group.

name: resource.design.interventions
displayName: Group of items providing information about the interventions of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.interventions.name
displayName: 'A short descriptive name of the intervention. If the same intervention is associated with more than one arm, please provide the information once and use the field ''Name of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention'' to associate it with more than one arm.'

name: resource.design.interventions.type
displayName: General type of the given intervention.

name: resource.design.interventions.description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given intervention.

name: resource.design.interventions.armsLabel
dataverseAlias: Name of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention
displayName: Name of the [RESOURCE] arm(s) associated with the given intervention.

name: resource.design.exposures
displayName: Group of items providing information about exposures of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.exposures.name
displayName: 'A short descriptive name of the exposure. If the same exposure is associated with more than one group, please provide the information once and use the field ''Name of the group(s) associated with the given exposure'' to associate it with more than one group.'

name: resource.design.exposures.type
displayName: General type of the given exposure.

name: resource.design.exposures.description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given exposure.

name: resource.design.exposures.groupsLabel
dataverseAlias: Name of the group(s) associated with the given exposure
displayName: Name of the [RESOURCE] group(s) associated with the given exposure.

name: resource.design.outcomes
displayName: Group of items providing information about outcome measures.

name: resource.design.outcomes.title
displayName: Name of the outcome measure. For non-interventional studies, this can be the name of specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment. For non-interventional studies, you can provide specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.

name: resource.design.outcomes.description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given outcome.

name: resource.design.outcomes.type
displayName: The type indicates the degree of importance of the outcome measure in the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.outcomes.timeFrame
displayName: Description of the time point(s) at which the measurement for the outcome is assessed, e.g. the specific duration of time over which each participant is assessed.

name: resource.design.comment
displayName: Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that could not be captured by other fields. You can provide here specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that could not be captured by other fields.

name: resource.design.assessments
displayName: Any additional assessments/measurements included in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan
displayName: Group of items providing information about the data sharing strategy of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.generally
dataverseAlias: Is it planned to share the data?
displayName: Indication whether there is a plan to make data collected in the [RESOURCE] available. In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other individuals, this refers to individual participant data (IPD). Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.supportingInformation
dataverseAlias: Supporting documents available in addition to the data
displayName: Supporting information/documents which will be made available in addition to the data collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.timeFrame
dataverseAlias: When and for how long will the data be available?
displayName: Indication of the time period for which the data and, if applicable, supporting documents will be made available.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.accessCriteria
displayName: Indication of the access criteria by which the data will be shared, including: a) with whom; b) for which types of analyses; and c) by what mechanism. Please provide here with whom, for which types of analyses and by what mechanism the data will be shared.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.description
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about data sharing, e.g. indication of which data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided. Please indicate here which data in particular will be shared, or the reasons why it will not be shared or it is not yet decided.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.datashield
displayName: Indication whether the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure is available.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.requestData
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page where the data request form and/or information on data reuse can be found.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.url
dataverseAlias: Web page with additional information about data sharing
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page where additional information about data sharing can be found.

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.recordLinkage
displayName: Indication if record linkage with other data sources is possible.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific non-interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.timePerspectives
displayName: Temporal design of the [RESOURCE], i.e. the observation period in relation to the time of participant enrollment. Is it a retrospective, prospective or cross-sectional [RESOURCE]?

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.targetFollowUpDuration
displayName: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant would be followed.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.targetFollowUpDuration.number
displayName: Numerical value of the target follow-up duration.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.targetFollowUpDuration.timeUnit
displayName: Unit of measurement used to describe the follow-up duration.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.targetFollowUpDuration.frequency
displayName: The number of follow-ups conducted within the specified duration.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.biospecimenRetention
displayName: Indication whether samples of biomaterials from participants of the [RESOURCE] are retained in a biorepository. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.nonInterventional.biospecimenDescription
displayName: Additional information about retained biosamples, i.e. an indication of the specific types of retained biospecimens (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.). You can provide here specific types of retained biosamples (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.).

name: resource.design.interventional
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource.design.interventional.phase
displayName: If applicable, numerical phase of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.interventional.masking
displayName: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

name: resource.design.interventional.masking.general
dataverseAlias: Is masking of intervention(s) assignment implemented?
displayName: Indication whether a masking (or blinding) of intervention(s) assignment is implemented (i.e., whether someone is prevented from having knowledge of the interventions assigned to individual participants).

name: resource.design.interventional.masking.roles
displayName: If masking is implemented, the party(ies) who are masked. Select all that apply.

name: resource.design.interventional.masking.description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about masking (e.g. information about other parties who may be masked). You can provide here additional information about masking, e.g. other parties who may be masked.

name: resource.design.interventional.allocation
dataverseAlias: Type of allocation of participants to an arm
displayName: Type of allocation/assignment of individual participants of the [RESOURCE] to an arm. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.design.interventional.offLabelUse
dataverseAlias: Off-label use of a drug product
displayName: 'Unapproved (off-label) use of a drug product. Select ''Yes'' or ''No'' only for a drug [RESOURCE] and ''Not applicable'' for any other [RESOURCE].'

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (XVI)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (XVII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the blood or blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (III)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the ear or mastoid process (VIII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the eye and adnexa (VII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (XIII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue (XII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: External causes of morbidity or mortality (XX)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Factors influencing health status and contact with health services (XXI)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (XIX)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.generally
dataverseAlias: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified (XVIII)

name: resource.design.groupsOfDiseases.conditions
dataverseAlias: Intestinal infection due to other Vibrio (1A01)

name: resource.design.mortalityData
dataverseAlias: Yes, vital status only (cause of death missing)

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Request for approval not yet submitted

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Request for approval submitted, approval pending

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Request for approval submitted, approval granted

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Request for approval submitted, exempt granted

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Request for approval submitted, approval denied

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Study withdrawn prior to decision on approval

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.status
dataverseAlias: Completed: Recruitment, data collection, and data quality management completed normally

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.stageStopped
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.stageStopped
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.stageStopped
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing

name: resource.design.administrativeInformation.stageStopped
dataverseAlias: Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing

name: resource.design.population.countries
dataverseAlias: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

name: resource.design.population.countries
dataverseAlias: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

name: resource.design.population.countries
dataverseAlias: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

name: resource.design.interventions.type
dataverseAlias: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)

name: resource.design.interventions.type
dataverseAlias: Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

name: resource.design.exposures.type
dataverseAlias: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)

name: resource.design.exposures.type
dataverseAlias: Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.generally
dataverseAlias: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.generally
dataverseAlias: No, there is no plan to make data available

name: resource.design.dataSharingPlan.generally
dataverseAlias: Undecided, it is not yet known if data will be made available
